entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
